metadata.title: CVE-2024-11159 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Using remote content in OpenPGP encrypted messages can lead to thedisclosure of plaintext. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 128.4.3and Thunderbird < 132.0.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
